Subsection.title: Name
Subsection.Paragraph: package extract-declaration - Extract a package declaration from a file without validation.

Subsection.title: Description
Subsection.Paragraph: The package extract-declaration command prints the serialized package declaration from the given package file.

FormalItem.title: Example
FormalItem.Verbatim: $ montarre package extract-declaration --file com.io7m.montarre.distribution/target/com.io7m.montarre.distribution-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.mpk <Package xmlns="urn:com.io7m.montarre.package:1"> <Metadata ApplicationKind="CONSOLE"> <Category Name="Building"></Category> ...
